body: Wow, a Doujin where Gudako is the dominant one teasing Astolfo! That’s actually really cute. As much as I love seeing Astolfo get fucked in his cute boipussy, something’s gotta be said about Astolfo getting some regular pussy himself. It’s kinda cute in its own right.
Pretty damn good (we need more straight Astolfo stuff, although I enjoy the gay stuff too), but the art style could be better.  Maybe I’m just not used to the artist, but oh well.  7/10 probably

im very disappointed at this doujin, coming from a very respected artist i expected more. at first it was going very good, but near the end it felt very rushed and it suddenly cuts off at the last panel. dont get me wrong its a wonder full material to fap on, but if the artist took just a little bit more time and add in 3-6 more panel then it would've been a much more better. overall i'd give this one a 6/10.
@Potox: "Lucky boi Astolfo even when he fucks he gets fucked" ftfy
The anatomy of cover + some of the art looks legit
Say what you will about Astolfo, the man who fucked his way through one hundred women shouldn't be teased

>She got her brains fucked out until morning

...That didn't quite give me the imagination I wanted. ._.
Poor boi Astolfo even when he fucks he gets fucked
